pydexpi.dexpi_classes.piping.gateValve module

This module contains a pydantic class for the DEXPI GateValve class

class pydexpi.dexpi_classes.piping.gateValve.GateValve(*, id: str = None, nodes: list[PipingNode] = [], customAttributes: list[CustomAttribute] = [], fluidCode: str | None = None, onHold: OnHoldClassification | None = None, pipingClassArtefact: PipingClassArtefactClassification | None = None, pressureTestCircuitNumber: str | None = None, heatTracingType: HeatTracingTypeClassification | None = None, heatTracingTypeRepresentation: str | None = None, insulationThickness: NullableLength | None = None, insulationType: str | None = None, lowerLimitHeatTracingTemperature: NullableTemperature | None = None, numberOfPorts: NumberOfPortsClassification | None = None, operation: OperationClassification | None = None, pipingClassCode: str | None = None, pipingComponentName: str | None = None, pipingComponentNumber: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: OperatedValve

A valve that is a valve where the closure member is a gate or disc with a linear motion parallel, or nearly parallel, to the plane of flat seats, which are transverse to the direction of flow (from http://data.posccaesar.org/rdl/RDS416519).

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {'validate_assignment': True}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'customAttributes': FieldInfo(annotation=list[CustomAttribute], required=False, default=[]), 'fluidCode': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'heatTracingType': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[HeatTracingTypeClassification, NoneType], required=False), 'heatTracingTypeRepresentation': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'id': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default_factory=<lambda>), 'insulationThickness': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[NullableLength, NoneType], required=False), 'insulationType': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'lowerLimitHeatTracingTemperature': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[NullableTemperature, NoneType], required=False), 'nodes': FieldInfo(annotation=list[PipingNode], required=False, default=[]), 'numberOfPorts': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[NumberOfPortsClassification, NoneType], required=False), 'onHold': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[OnHoldClassification, NoneType], required=False), 'operation': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[OperationClassification, NoneType], required=False), 'pipingClassArtefact': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[PipingClassArtefactClassification, NoneType], required=False), 'pipingClassCode': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'pipingComponentName': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'pipingComponentNumber': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'pressureTestCircuitNumber': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False)}

This replaces Model.__fields__ from Pydantic V1.
